title: Ocean view - Historic - Parking - Most Utilities Included - Sunny...!
posting_body: Experience living in one of Salem’s most desirable neighborhoods.
The house was built circa 1800s, has outstanding ocean views and a deeded parking spot.
This 2nd floor unit offers a spacious bedroom, charming living/dining room and a cozy breakfast bar.
The condo offers the comforts of modern living, with the charm of the 1800s.
Complete with genuine hardwood floors, and most utilities are included.
Condo rules state the following, with no exceptions:
The unit is zoned for a single occupant, and there’re guest and noise policies.
The pet policy states no dogs are permitted.
This is a T.A.W. lease to ensure a perfect fit for everyone.
That stated, over 25 years, most tenants have lived here for numerous years.
Just yards from the Salem Commons and Atlantic Ocean, you can watch the tidal changes and enjoy the crisp air of the Atlantic Ocean from your home in complete privacy.
Trips to Boston are a breeze with the ferry boat 2 minutes away, and the local swimming spot is just beyond a stones throw.
The laundry building is appox.100 yards away.
Tenant will be required to complete a criminal and credit check via a 3rd party, costs are refunded after a year’s successful tenancy.
Verification of employment will be performed.
If you’re loud, rude or inconsiderate of others – Please don’t bother applying.
Many of the houses in the neighborhood are registered as historic homes.
As with many old cities, houses are close together.
For an old house, you’ll have a surprising amount of privacy.
Loud music, loud talking, and loud walking will be overheard - Please be aware of this fact.
Essex Street activities can’t be controlled, but you won’t find a quieter house to call home.
That stated, normal living noise is expected; with plenty of sun you’ll cherish the relaxation and comfort this home affords.
The condo will be received in immaculately clean condition.
Tenant is responsible for hiring a professional cleaning company at the end of tenancy.
